m_szDocTitle: Europe Unites to Invest $40 Billion in Huge Off-Shore Renewable Energy Super-Grid | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Europe Unites to Invest $40 Billion in Huge Off-Shore Renewable Energy Super-Grid January 4th, 2010 by Susan Kraemer   This month Europe’s first electricity super-grid dedicated to renewable energy will become a political reality, as part of Europe’s plan to meet its target to reduce greenhouse gas emissions 20% below 1990 levels by 2020. [social_buttons] Nine countries will draw up formal plans to link up a super-grid of powerful clean energy projects strung out all around the North Sea in order to ship renewable power to the mainland. The huge new undersea transmission cable will connect up
